Posts.EditableText: Is there any way to add pictures to the interactive story using Squiffy?
Posts.HTML: Is there any way to add pictures to the interactive story using Squiffy?

Posts.EditableText: Here's one way. ``` @set giffy = t1.gif ``` You can also just stick t1.gif into the image command with double quotes.
Posts.HTML:
Here's one way.

@set giffy = t1.gif
<img src={giffy} alt="Smiley face" height="200" width="200">

You can also just stick t1.gif into the image command with double quotes.
